help.description: This is super cool - I get to help out other people! Let's go and take a peek at some of the commands I have, 'kay?

author.name: Oh, I'd love to help you be your character! >3<

fields.name: create PREFIX, NAME, URL
fields.value:
This'll register your character in my collection of mimicry! OoOoo.
Example: mimic create ]] Erki https://i.imgur.com/Hermeke.jpg

fields.name: edit PREFIX, NAME, URL
fields.value:
This'll edit what I know about the character. Sometimes, Characters are wrong!
Example: mimic edit ]] Erki https://i.imgur.com/3Po2Xm8.jpg

fields.name: delete PREFIX
fields.value:
I'll forget the character. :c
Example: mimic delete ]]

fields.name: list
fields.value: I'll tell you about the characters you own!

fields.name: To actually make me mimic...
fields.value:
Use that prefix you gave me earlier, then the message.
For example, with Erki: ]]Hi, I'm Erki!

notspec.title: Heya! I can help you edit a character, no worries!
notspec.description: You just need to select what *part*. the `name`, `prefix`, or `image`.

invalid.title: That's not a valid option!
invalid.description: You need to select the `name`, `prefix`, or `image`.
